scripts.dev: bun --cwd apps/backend dev & bun --cwd apps/worker dev & wait
scripts.infra:deploy:all:prod: bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy worker prod && bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy lambda prod && bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy client prod
scripts.infra:deploy:all:staging: bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy worker staging && bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy lambda staging && bash infra/infra-run.sh deploy client staging
scripts.infra:destroy:all:prod: bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy worker prod && bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy lambda prod && bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy client prod
scripts.infra:destroy:all:staging: bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy worker staging && bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy lambda staging && bash infra/infra-run.sh destroy client staging
